title:
Who is in charge of making UNCW\'s schedule, and why is it different than its sister schools, and local schools? 

Why is there no uniform schedule for all UNC schools, has this always been the case?



UNC-Chapel Hill, UNC-Charlotte, ECU, NCSU, Duke & CFCC all have the same spring break schedule. While UNCW\'s is a week later.



Trying to plan events or vacation with family and friends, especially when siblings and/or friends attend other schools, is next to impossible.
